Package kademlia

Interface KadStatistician

All Known Implementing Classes:
Statistician
public interface KadStatistician
Specification for class that keeps statistics for a Kademlia instance. These statistics are temporary and will be lost when Kad is shut down.
Since:
20140507

  • Method Details

    • sentData

      void sentData​(long size)
      Used to indicate some data is sent
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the data sent

    • getTotalDataSent

      long getTotalDataSent()
      Returns:
      The total data sent in KiloBytes

    • receivedData

      void receivedData​(long size)
      Used to indicate some data was received
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the data received

    • getTotalDataReceived

      long getTotalDataReceived()
      Returns:
      The total data received in KiloBytes

    • setBootstrapTime

      void setBootstrapTime​(long time)
      Sets the bootstrap time for this Kademlia Node
      Parameters:
      time - The bootstrap time in nanoseconds

    • getBootstrapTime

      long getBootstrapTime()
      Returns:
      How long the system took to bootstrap in milliseconds

    • addContentLookup

      void addContentLookup​(long time, int routeLength, boolean isSuccessful)
      Add the timing for a new content lookup operation that took place
      Parameters:
      time - The time the content lookup took in nanoseconds
      routeLength - The length of the route it took to get the content
      isSuccessful - Whether the content lookup was successful or not

    • numContentLookups

      int numContentLookups()
      Returns:
      The total number of content lookups performed.

    • numFailedContentLookups

      int numFailedContentLookups()
      Returns:
      How many content lookups have failed.

    • totalContentLookupTime

      long totalContentLookupTime()
      Returns:
      The total time spent on content lookups.

    • averageContentLookupTime

      double averageContentLookupTime()
      Compute the average time a content lookup took
      Returns:
      The average time in milliseconds

    • averageContentLookupRouteLength

      double averageContentLookupRouteLength()
      Compute the average route length of content lookup operations.
      Returns:
      The average route length
